name: COVID19LabTestsLOINC
title: COVID19 Lab Tests (LOINC)
description:
Source https://loinc.org/prerelease/
Given the variability in laboratory coding of tests, this value set will be most useful with robust mapping of source data to the LOINC reference terms.  Source data may commonly contain codes from LabCorp (https://www.labcorp.com/coronavirus-disease-covid-19/provider-information), Quest (https://www.questdiagnostics.com/home/Covid-19/), and Bioreference (https://www.bioreference.com/coronavirus/).
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Intended to support surveillance and monitoring of testing rates and testing results),(Data Element Scope: Compilation of LOINC codes for lab tests of COVID-19 virus and antibodies),(Inclusion Criteria: LOINC codes for COVID-19 related lab tests, including pre-release and emergency codes (once available in VSAC), reference laboratory, point of care, and home-based tests),(Exclusion Criteria: None)
